title: VC Record Schema
description: Minimal record of a Verifiable Credential containing only its ID, a hash of the VC, a timestamp, and revocation status.

id.description: The identifier of the Verifiable Credential.

vcHash.description: A SHA-256 hash of the complete VC in hexadecimal format.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the record was created or updated.

revoked.description: Boolean indicating if the VC has been revoked.
